key_risks: Market concentration in the U.S. municipal bond market
Regulatory risks from U.S. and European insurance regulations
Litigation risks related to underwriting practices and claims handling
Economic sensitivity to interest rate fluctuations and municipal bond market health
controversies: Ongoing litigation related to underwriting practices and claims handling
environmental_issues: Exposure to high-risk sectors like healthcare and transportation may challenge ESG goals
social_issues: Potential reputational damage from litigation and claims handling controversies
governance_issues: Regulatory changes impacting business model and profitability
